name: E-DataAid 1.x File
summary: Learn about .EDAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The E-Prime software is commonly used in research environments for conducting experiments in behavioral research, fMRI research, and eye tracking research.
NOTE: E-DataAid version 2 saves files with the .EDAT2 extension.

description: File created by E-DataAid version 1, a data manipulation tool included with E-Prime psychology study software; saves data in the format of rows and columns; saves participant input data during the data collection phase; can be exported to StatView, SPSS, Microsoft Excel, Compressed IFIS, and text formats for statistical analysis.
